subject: Pedal set Order query
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I received a pedal set recently and have noticed that the order description does not match what arrived.

The order is for: Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Ã— 1

I did not however receive a haptic reactor with my
Delivery

[image0.jpeg]
[image1.jpeg]
This is everything that arrived. Is there something wrong with my delivery? Can you help?

Kind regards,

Paul

conversations.body_text: Hi Paul Stevenson,     Sorry, but the Haptic reactor comes with an optional purchase.
